瀳字的基本解释

瀳
jiàn
水至。
水名。

瀳
zùn
水浸出的样子。

瀳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
［《廣韻》在甸切，去霰，從。］
(1)水沸涌而至貌。
(2)水名。
[②]［zùn］
［《集韻》徂悶切，去，從。］
水渗出貌。

瀳字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　瀳； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页661第01
【唐韻】在甸切【集韻】才甸切，?音荐。【說文】水至也。瀳或作洊。《易·坎卦》水洊至。　又【集韻】租昆切，音尊。義同。　又【唐韻】則前切【集韻】將先切，?音箋。義同。一曰水名。　又【集韻】才先切，音前。義同。　又徂悶切，存去聲。水出貌。

考證：〔【說文】水至也。【易·坎卦】水瀳至。【石經】作洊。〕　謹按說文瀳字註未引易文作瀳不得徑稱易坎卦水瀳集韻云瀳或作洊謹改爲瀳或作洊易坎卦水洊至。
瀳字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瀳字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàn］
["Guangyun" is cutting in Dian, go to ha, follow. ]
(1) The water boils to the appearance.
(2) Water name.
[②]［zùn］
["Jiyun" is dull and cut, go to , follow. ]
The water seeps out.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Shuizi Department】　瀳; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 661 01
[Tang Yun] Cut at Dian [Ji Yun] to cut Dian,? Yin recommended. [Said the text] The water is here.瀳 or make 洊. "Yi·Kan Gua" water bleeds.　[Jiyun] renting Kunqi, Yinzun. The same meaning.　[Tang Yun] will cut first [Ji Yun] will cut first,? Yin Jing. The same meaning. One is the name of the water.　[Jiyun] Cut first, before the sound. The same meaning.　It's dull and cut again, save the sound. The water looks good. Textual research: [[Said the text] Water to the same. [Easy·Kan Gua] The water is overwhelming. 【Stone Classics】For 洊. 〕 　 I would like to say that the word note of Wenyi is not quoted in Yiwen Zuoyi, and it shall not be called Yikan Gua Shuiyi Ji Yunyun Yunyi or Zuohui Jin changed to Yi or Zhuyiyi Kan Gua Shuizhizhi.
